name two of the four rules of being a Messenger
answer: (Any two) 1. When a customer gives you a message, repeat it back to make sure you have it right. 2. Always wear your red jacket so people can identify you. 3. Go as fast as possible. 4. Deliver a message only to the person it's meant for, no one else.
